name: projetinhorpg
description:
A souls-like prototype game.

There are 2 scenes in the game. The first one is a character editor (only mask and eye are customizable), the second one is a test area in a lake.

controls -->

wasd or arrows - move

Mouse Left - atack

Left CTRL - change weapon (visual  only)

left SHIFT - run

Spacebar - roll

Q - locktarget
